short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Open current URL in smart phone by scanning QR code.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Open any link is a simple web extension that will let you open a URL from your machine's web browser to your smart phone, just by scanning the QR code.
